html: If you lose power due to Hurricane #Lane: - Keep freezers & refrigerators closed - Turn off or disconnect appliances, equipment, & electronics to avoid damage from power surges - Throw away any food exposed to temps of 40+ degrees for 2 or more hours - Only use generators outsidepic.twitter.com/9yZPixcFc5
text:
If you lose power due to Hurricane #Lane:
- Keep freezers & refrigerators closed
- Turn off or disconnect appliances, equipment, & electronics to avoid damage from power surges
- Throw away any food exposed to temps of 40+ degrees for 2 or more hours
- Only use generators outsidepic.twitter.com/9yZPixcFc5
